typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sid as string,
		sname as string,
		subjects as string,
		marks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		sid as string,
		sname as string,
		azure as string,
		bi as string,
		etl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 pivot(groupBy(sid),
	pivotBy(subjects),
	total = sum(toInteger(marks)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
source2 unpivot(output(
		
	),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
